p: Nevertheless, despite these limitations, the estimates obtained in CoronaSurveys show high correlation with serology tests. Moreover, since the underestimation of our method over all regions is homogeneous, and consistent with the one third fraction of asymptomatic reported by Pollán et al. ( 14), these estimates can be "corrected” to provide an accurate cumulative number of cases for each region. We will further evaluate the robustness of our model as Pollán et al. publish the results of their three additional serology studies.
